aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.heading: THE STORY OF WAKARAN ENGLISH
aboutUs.subheading: ー THIS IS HOW WE CAME TO BE!
aboutUs.description: Our mission is to improve our English skills by creating fun and useful content — and to share our progress with you along the way. From quiz games and daily blogs to English news, we're learning by doing and bringing you the best of our journey. Join us as we grow, learn, and explore English together!

featuredProjects.description:
We’re working to improve our English speaking skills by sharing videos that help us practice
ー like interviews with native speakers!

selfIntroduction.title: WE ARE
selfIntroduction.description:
We are students learning web design, creating English learning content while 
improving our skills and aiming to connect with English learners like you.

members.subtitle: WAKARAN ENGLISH's
members.title: Fun Crew!
members.descriptionTop: We are a team of students from various nationalities gathered to study English.
members.descriptionBottom: We'd be happy if you get to know us!

aya.msg: I love Western music! I want to travel abroad too!

yuki.name: Yuki a.k.a Alex
yuki.msg: The most important thing when studying languages is 'Speaking'!

blog.description: We also share cool things about life in Osaka, and our members write blogs to help you learn and connect.

Hi there! I’m ikuchan from Wakaran English!
I’m here to study English with you for this one year...
